entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
